About Recipedia

Recipedia is a website that is dedicated to extending knowledge about cooking and providing an opportunity for individuals who are interested in learning more about the culinary arts. We offer a wide range of resources, including recipes, cooking tips, and instructional videos, that are designed to help you improve your skills in the kitchen. Our goal is to provide an accessible platform that inspires creativity, experimentation, and a passion for cooking. Whether you are a beginner or an experienced cook, our website offers something for everyone.

Developers Note

My Name is Lysander and I am the one who created this website as part of a school project. My goal is to provide a platform where people can find and share their favorite recipes with others. My focus is on creating a user-friendly interface that makes it easy for everyone to access.

It's important to note that I do not own the pictures displayed on this website. All images used here are sourced from publicly available websites, and I make every effort to ensure that I credit the original sources of these images wherever possible. I do not claim any ownership or copyright over the images used on our website.

It's also important to note that I do not make any money from this website.

My website is purely for educational and non-commercial purposes. I am not affiliated with any food or cooking-related businesses, nor do I endorse any particular products or services.
